questions.question: What is one of the traditional Timorese fire-starting techniques mentioned in the lesson plan?
Which of the following is NOT listed as a modern fire-starting tool in the lesson plan?
What is the term for easily combustible material used to start a fire?
Which of the following is described as small twigs or sticks used to build up a fire from the initial flame?
What is the term for larger pieces of wood that sustain a fire?
Which fire-starting method creates heat through friction between two pieces of wood?
What is an ember?
choices: A small, glowing piece of coal or wood in a dying fire
The initial spark of a fire
questions.answer: A small, glowing piece of coal or wood in a dying fire

questions.question: What is the term for the arrangement of tinder, kindling, and fuel to start and maintain a fire?

Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a fire safety measure in the lesson plan?
What is the suggested homework assignment in the lesson plan?
choices: Write a report on a traditional fire-starting method from another culture
questions.answer: Write a report on a traditional fire-starting method from another culture

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a topic in the Fire Craft learning unit?
What is one of the activities mentioned for the Fire Craft learning unit?
choices: Demonstrating friction fire-starting using local materials
Designing a new type of fire extinguisher
questions.answer: Demonstrating friction fire-starting using local materials

questions.question: Which principle is mentioned as part of the course's ethical approach to bushcraft?
What type of navigation is taught in addition to map and compass skills?

choices: Build permanent structures in the wilderness
Conduct workshops on bushcraft skills for local youth groups
Introduce non-native species for food foraging
questions.answer: Conduct workshops on bushcraft skills for local youth groups
